name: perish-body

effect.scarlet-violet: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.
effect.the-teal-mask: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.
effect.the-indigo-disk: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.

short_effect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
